projects.title: Applify: Job application tracker
projects.description:
A minimalist app to manage job applications. 
   Deployed using 15+ AWS resources with CloudFormation 
   Dockerized front-end & back-end, deployed on Kubernetes with Terraform 
   Supports both serverless and serverful architectures

projects.title: Do-It! Household chores manager
projects.description:
A collaborative tool for tracking chores among multiple users. 
   Multi-user dashboard with progress tracking 
  Integrated OAuth 2.0 + refresh tokens for seamless login 
   Built 7+ REST APIs for CRUD operations 
   Notifications powered by AWS SNS

work.company: Scotia Investments - A Family of Companies
work.description: Built three Next.js landing sites serving 1,000+ daily visitors, automated data transforms with multithreaded Python, added Google Analytics to five sites, and delivered a SQL dashboard for product performance.
Built 10+ GitHub Actions for CI/CD, automated chain releases across 5+ repos, containerized 4+ services with ACR, integrated Snyk scanning, and produced OCI images with Docker, Kaniko, and Buildah.
